content: The status message set by a user is stream-independent, but the option to set/update the status can be brought up by pressing the ellipsis on the Users window. A better alternative could be to have the option in the account settings, since it is common for all streams. Is there any specific reason for keeping it through the users window? Has this been discussed before?
The users window on right is not stream dependent either. It just shows all the users in the organization.
Yeah, I agree with Sahil Batra, and the main place the status is displayed is in the sidebar, which makes it a natural place for that UI to live.
